name: Bouncy Burgers
description:
PRESS BOTH LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS AT THE SAME TIME TO SELECT IN THE MENUS

BOUNCY BURGERS IS A GAME MADE IN 30 HOURS FOR THE MINIJAM 94 - BAKING.

ONLY ARROW KEYS TO PLAY

FEATURING AN ONLINE LEADERBOARD!!

(with randomly generated names due to only having two buttons)
